ca.ualberta.cs.team16app

Class CacheManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • ca.ualberta.cs.team16app.CacheManager

  • public class CacheManager
extends java.lang.Object
    The CacheManager is responsible for caching and the retrieving of such cached stories. It will check if the cache is full before doing such operations and clear it if it is in order for new stories to be cached. Tutorial: http://stackoverflow.com/questions/9942560/when-to-clear-the-cache-dir-in-android

      CacheManager()

      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void cacheData(java.util.ArrayList<Claim> cacheLibrary)
      Caches a given library of stories into the phone after checking the cache size.

      Deletes a given claim from cache.

      Retrieves the cache library of a phone.
      static CacheManager getInstance() 
      void initApplicationContext(Context context)
      Initializes the manager to the application's context.
      void retrieveData()
      Retrieves all cached stories into the phone and sets it to be the current cache library in this manager.
